# Copilot Instructions

## General Guidelines
- First general instruction
- Second general instruction

## Code Style
- Use specific formatting rules
- Follow naming conventions

## Project-Specific Rules
- IStockProvider supplies data for B3StockMonitorService.
- IVecnaProvider is a provider at the same level as IStockProvider; it supplies data for VecnaMonitorService. There is no hierarchy between IStockProvider and IVecnaProvider.
